text: Asep Budi Sentosa (born 19 September 1990) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays for Liga 1 club Persiraja Banda Aceh as a defender. Previously, he played for several other Indonesian clubs, such as Persik Kediri, Persela Lamongan, Persiba Balikpapan and Persita Tangerang. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Persita Tangerang * Liga 2 runner-up: 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Indonesian footballers Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Persiraja Banda Aceh players
title: Asep Budi Sentosa
